text: Southern Charm ’ s Kathryn Dennis broke her silence regarding the allegations of sexual assault against her costar and the father of her two children, Thomas Ravenel. “ Well, I ’ m waiting until the investigation is complete before I comment on anything. Right now my kids are my main focus. ” Dennis, 26, said after Andy Cohen asked her on the Monday, May 21, episode of Watch What Happens Live if she had “ anything to say ” regarding the allegations. Dennis and Ravenel, who dated on and off for the first four seasons of the Bravo series, share daughter Kensie, 4, and son Saint, 2.
